title: Love the application (minor issues lately.)
text: I‚Äôve used this app for as long as I can remember because it‚Äôs a lot easier than other apps such as safari or Firefox to do my searches in especially because they aren't long questions most of the time so it‚Äôs super simple. But lately I‚Äôve been using the app and it has crashed no matter what page I‚Äôm on about 1-2 minutes into searching and reading something almost every time. I thought it would be great to write a review to get this bug fixed if it is something that is happening to other people as well.

title: Change my Google password
text:
The instructions say to go to the top right of the screen in the Gmail app M, and tap my initial, but my initial does not appear. There is a tap so I can go no further. and my password has been compromised by a scam questionnaire screen sent anonymously to me. I MUST CHANGE MY PASSWORD IMMEDIATELY. WHERE IS THE HELP FROM YOU???????

I have tried providing a nickname, but no nickname has been acceptable to. Some of the nicknames I tried were names, spelled backwards that would EXTREMELY UNLIKELY FOR ANYONE ELSE TO HAVE SELECTED. THIS FEELS LIKE A HOAX AND A TIME WASTER AND I HAVE NO TIME TO waste!!

title: Google Doesn‚Äôt Respect People With Disabilities
text:
Ugh‚Ä¶ Another genius trying to tinker with what was just fine in what is most likely an attempt to justify his or her job. Why is it that now when you select a search result, does it only come up on the screen about 4/5ths of the way? 
Do Google developers care, or understand, that people with disabilities such as OCD, or similar issues, have a very, VERY, rough time when you change major issues such as this? It‚Äôs seriously ruining people‚Äôs daily lives, such as myself. 
I know that may be hard to understand for people who do not understand these types of diseases. But it is not a picnic. 
Also, the big oval search bar???
Wow!!! Who got paid for that piece of trash idea? 

Please stop tinkering with what was just perfectly fine to begin with. 
Develop, and make your business greater, without making tiny changes that will just either annoy, or in certain cases, debilitate people. 

I beg you‚Ä¶ üôèüèª
On behalf of all the people who understand our daily cross to bear‚Ä¶
Please return clicking on search results to full screen. 
Please here me. üò™

title: DaZou Mobile Detailing LLC
text: Owner Joshua Elam and his car detailing business are easy to recommend.  He‚Äôs responsive to inquiries, showed up promptly, and did a very professional and outstanding job!  He paid attention to detail and made sure everything was done to my satisfaction. My car looked brand new and spotless inside and out when he was finished. And he did it all at my house!  I didn‚Äôt have to drop my car off anywhere.   His service is A+!  I highly recommend and will use him again.

title: A Review on the Google App:
text: Whenever you get a new iPhone, the first web browser you'll have is Google. Now Google is like any other web browser, but it cares more about security. Google is also one of the ‚Äúgiants‚Äù in today's society with modern technology. This app has other features, though! You can search with your camera, and there is a little game hidden there, which you can play for a while in the ‚Äútab‚Äù section. Well, that's all I have to say about the Google app!

title: Language problems
text: Google used to be one of my favorite apps. It showed me everything I was looking for. Everything was okay and my translator was working. But I tried to translate from English to my original language (Japanese) because I was stuck on a English word I didn‚Äôt know. But every time I tried to change the language, it took me to my last search. And it kept deleting my tabs. Please if you have a solution or know anything I can do about it please let me know! I really need the translator for English. Especially now that I‚Äôm starting University. It is really hard to keep track of my English classes and phrases. So please inform me of anything you know that I can do about my translator problem! If you can Thank you!!

userName: All names taken and so annoyed
title: Searching in the app overheats phone constantly.
text: Out of all of the apps on my phone, including other browsers and actual Video Games, this is the only app that constantly and consistently burns up my phone and kills my battery when I‚Äôm using it. I‚Äôm on an iPhone 12 and it really makes it hard to use this app for more than just extremely short bursts, as it gets hot within a minute or two of just opening the app. Aside from those problems, browser works well like most browsers, and while it can sometimes be slow after some use, that could probably be because of how much phone power it‚Äôs already apparently taking up.

title: Image search no longer functional

title: Bad set up after recent updates

title: UI leaves something to be desired
text: As a Nest owner pre-Google I enjoyed the device and the application. Now, it appears all the original design team either quit or embarked elsewhere. User experience is at an all time low, the application borderlines early 2000 graphics and it appears no one even wire framed the concept or someone was asleep at the wheel. If this was restored to nest style I believe you would see more positive reviews. As well as functionality, the app works, if you can find anything. Most advanced controls are unavailable, for instance to set certain devices on 2.4 ghz, or even the updating of firmware. Alas, I fear this app may go the way of most Google product.

title: Gravimetric Method for Detection Energy and Force Between Bio Specific Molecules Interaction
text:
The main idea of this method based on the Earth‚Äôs gravity field which allow to detect differences between positive and negative serological test results where the suspension‚Äôs masses of particles can be detected and the minimum concentration of antibody could be taken in really for finals calculation the Energy and Force among the antigens and antibodies. As a model it was used hemagglutination immune suspension test. The Energy and Force were detected on the base of common equation E=mgh, where m - masses of erythrocytes, g - gravity acceleration of Earth‚Äôs, h - height of erythrocytes location!
This draft composed on the base of prepared for publication article.
Whether this idea would be interested for your organization, don‚Äôt hesitate to contact me for any chance!
Sorry for my trouble you with this idea!
Best regards,
Sergei Kalnoi, Dr. Sci. Med., Biotechnology and Microbiology.

title: Google workspace and google
text: I have made at least 8 attempts to send emails and messages to google telling them I need help eventually to just delete my account since there is no support.  I was ignored every time.  No response!  Google just continues to take my money even though I‚Äôve not logged into the account at all in over 5 weeks.  My trial ended they just want the money.  They care nothing about their customers at all.  If they did they would make it so you could contact customer support without having to ask 5 forums for help and advice.  Why would I ask a forum for advice about google stealing from both my bank accounts for one moth fee.  Can they work that out?? NO THEY CANT!

title: Stilly River Yarns
text: Stilly Tiver Yarns is a gem of a yarn store located in downtown Stanwood , en route to Camano Island, or a jog off of I5 for those traveling north or south. Lindsay, the owner is a multi-talented yarn wizard who gives her customers personalized attention. She‚Äôll help with pattern and yarn selection as well as helping with measurements for a great fit. No more making garments that don‚Äôt quite fit.  This is not the 1980‚Äôs. This is a knitting store for today with all of the newest tips and tricks. Stilly also has a curated selection of yarn from local yarns to all times faves like Malabrigo.

title: Google is your Friend
text: I like to learn something new every day.  I mean, nobody likes to be the dumbest person in the room, am I right or am I right?  They say God helps those who helps themselves.  So help yourself from being a mouth breathing, bottom feeding ignoramus by bumping up those brain-wrinkling IQ points and help the world be a better place.  And because the internet knows everything, what better way to access all that information than by using Google?  Knowledge is Power, folks.  And knowing is half the battle.  Message!

title: I adore this app, but the images are messed up
text: I use this app nearly everyday. I learn many things off of it and I am surprised by the many things I‚Äôve learned from it. I‚Äôm going to put this straight forward, the images are stupid. Images are now set up like the safari images, which I hate. I liked when you could tap on an image and instantly see it perfectly. But now when you tap it, it shades it and has a little ‚ÄúX‚Äù at the top. This is very distracting and I cannot see images in full screen. I really recommend that you fix this google, I hope.
